snippet: Ayman Odeh said he was hopeful in part because his alliance of Arab parties, known as the Joint List, had done so well in the March voting.
abstract: Arab-Israeli Knesset member Ayman Odeh sees hope for peace in electoral success of alliance of Arab parties; claims result of March 2013 election, despite returning conservatives to power and subsequent spate of violence, shows Israelis and Palestinians can work together.
lead_paragraph: Ayman Odeh said he was hopeful in part because his alliance of Arab parties, known as the Joint List, had done so well in the March voting.

headline.main: Arab-Israeli Parliament Member Sees Prospect for Peace
headline.print_headline: Arab-Israeli Parliament Member Sees Prospect for Peace
